sentences.sCn: 他们把工作全部包了出去。

sentences.sContent: None of us can be absolved wholly of wrong doing.
sentences.sContent_eng: None of us can be absolved wholly of wrong doing.
sentences.sCn: 我们当中没有一个人的罪行能完全获得赦免。

sentences.sContent: He reaffirmed that he was wholly responsible for the confusion.
sentences.sContent_eng: He reaffirmed that he was wholly responsible for the confusion.
sentences.sCn: 他再次表明对此混乱情况他负有全部责任。
